sentences.en: A sesame stalk puts forth blossoms notch by notch, higher and higher.
And going up somehow, of fund manager notch poorer even.
sentences.cn: 而且在某种程度上, 基金经理的得分甚至更差.

sentences.en: Cut a notch near one end of the stick.
sentences.cn: 在手杖的一端刻一个V形记号。

sentences.en: He acted up to the notch in that matter.
He is a notch above the others.
He is keen to notch up yet another success.
Her new book is several notches above anything else she has written.
sentences.cn: 她的新书比她的其他作品高出了好几个等级。

sentences.en: How do you know the Rangers'defense is coached a top - notch fisherman?
sentences.cn: 你怎麽知道游骑兵队的防守是经过某位捕鱼高手指导过的?

sentences.en: Jackson raised his voice by a notch.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊将嗓音提高了一度。

sentences.en: My regard for her went up another notch.
sentences.cn: 我对她的敬重又增加了一等.

sentences.en: Prices have reached the top notch since the race riot.
sentences.cn: 自从发生种族骚乱,物价已经升到顶点.

sentences.en: She decided she was going to take this man down a notch or two.
sentences.cn: 她下定决心要把这个男人的锐气打下去一截子.

sentences.en: The actual control condition at the root of the notch is more problematic.
sentences.cn: 在缺口根部的实际控制条件是更难捉摸的.

sentences.en: The peanuts they grow are top - notch .
sentences.cn: 他们种的花生是 拔尖 的.

sentences.en: The President is keen to notch a political triumph that would foster freer world trade and faster economic growth.
sentences.cn: 总统渴望获得政治胜利，以促使世界贸易更为自由，经济发展更为迅速。

sentences.en: The quality of the food here has dropped a notch recently.
sentences.cn: 这里的饭菜质量最近下降了一级。

sentences.en: The slabs of standing stone point roughly toward the invisible notch.
sentences.cn: 这些矗立的石块,大致指向那个看不见的缺口.

sentences.en: The Spartans turned it up a notch in the second half.
sentences.cn: 斯巴达人队在下半场中比分有所提高。

sentences.en: We encourage top - notch talents with innovative ideas to come to the fore.
sentences.cn: 鼓励拔尖创新人才成长.

words.tran_cn: 有凹口的；有缺口的；有锯齿状的
赢得；用刻痕计算；在…上刻凹痕

phrases.tran_cn: 陷波滤波器；凹口滤波器；阶式滤波器
切口冲豢度；刻痕冲豢度；缺口冲煌度；抗缺口冲击韧性
切口灵敏度；缺口灵感度

trans.tran_cn: (V字形的)槽口，刻痕，<美>峡谷，等级
trans.tran_en: a V-shaped cut or hole in a surface or edge

trans.tran_cn: 砍，切，在…上作刻痕、开槽口，作刻痕计算，得分
